name: White stiff net Rock 'N' Roll petticoat
description:
Lovely stiff net 2 layer petticoat with 4 tiers in each layer,lace on bottom of outer layer, there is a polyester lining to stop net scratching your legs,elasticated waist.. These can be worn as skirts and look great with Bustiers or Corset tops 

All my items are made to the highest standard using the best quality materials..... 

Choice of colour: White,Ivory,Baby blue,Red,Black,Purple,Navy,Pink
Size 8 to 20 (please state waist size and colour after purchase) 
Length 26 inches approx 

All items posted within 3 days of purchase

name: Pink and fluffy 6 layer vintage style petticoat
description:
Beautiful hand crafted vintage stiff net petticoat 50's 60's style,there are 6 beautiful layers of pink stiff net gathered on to polyester band and then gathered into a waistband, fully lined. 

Length: 28 inch approx 
Waist: custom to fit you 


Colours available: Pink White

name: Rock'n'Roll petticoat 50's style beautifull a must have
description:
One of my best petticoat creations a beautifull Rock'n'Roll reproduction in a lovely shade of pink with 3 layers of stiff net all hems having white lace on which makes a strong contrast, under lining in poleyester, elasticated waist...... 

These can be worn as skirts and look great with Bustiers or Corset tops 


All item are all made by me to a very high standard with the best quality fabrics.... 


Size 12 to 18  (Free size waist stretch from 26 in to 34 in)
Length 26 inches
